dict.string:
The Accessory Setup Kit Logging Profile allows Apple to troubleshoot issues with your device and helps Apple to improve its related products and services. The generated files may contain personal information, such as unique Bluetooth and Wi-Fi identifiers, including nearby Wi-Fi network and accessory names. The logs may also contain sensitive data, such as configured application settings with the available paired accessories, and any errors that are encountered with a specific accessory.
The profile will expire after 3 days. To uninstall the profile at any time, open Settings, tap "General," then "Profiles," then "Accessory Setup Kit Logging Profile," and tap "Delete Profile."
By enabling this diagnostic tool and sending a copy of the generated files to Apple, you are consenting to Apple's use of the content of such files in accordance with its privacy policy (http://www.apple.com/legal/privacy).
Apple Confidential Profile. Do not distribute. Not to be used or disclosed without permission from Apple. Copyright ¬© 2024, Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

Enables logging for Accessory Setup Kit on iOS and iPadOS
